scripts.build: npm run todo; npm run codegen && next build
scripts.analyze-bundle: npm run todo; ANALYZE_BUNDLE=1 npm run build
scripts.codegen: npm run todo; npm run prisma -- generate
scripts.psql: npm run todo; npm run with-env -- bash -c 'psql $DATABASE_CONNECTION_STRING'
scripts.prisma: npm run todo; npm run with-env -- prisma
scripts.todo: ( sh -c 'echo && echo Analyzing TODOs...' && npm run todo-sh >/dev/null; exit 0 ) || npm run todo-win
scripts.todo-win: echo "Not running on Linux or macOS, performing simple TODO check." && git grep -n TODO\ ASAP || echo "No TODOs found, good job!"
scripts.todo-sh: ( ( ! git grep -n TODO\ ASAP 1>&2 || npm run todo-sh-error-blocker ) && echo No imminent TODOs found, good job! 1>&2 )
scripts.todo-sh-error-blocker: ( echo && echo ========================================= && echo There are TODO\ ASAPs in your code, please && echo review them with '`npm run todo`'. && echo && echo Press ENTER or wait 10s to continue. && echo ========================================= && echo && bash -c 'read -t 10'; exit 1 ) 1>&2
